Package model

Class StandardShelf

java.lang.Object
util.Observable<Shelf.Event>
model.abstractModel.Shelf
model.StandardShelf
public class StandardShelf extends Shelf
This class is an implementation of Shelf

It defines shelf as a 6 by 5 2d array of Tiles
